## HPP vs. NPP vs. Matern

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1, 3))
plot(rpoispp(lambda = 100, win=square(1)),main = "HPP (rate = 100)") #plot_2D_HPP
plot(rpoispp(lambda = function(x, y) 400*x*y, win=square(1)), main = "NPP (intensity = 100*x)") #plot_2D_NPP
plot(rMatClust(kappa = 20, r = 0.05, mu = 5), main = "Matern (kappa = 20, r = 0.05, mu = 5)") #plot_2D_Matern
```
